title.narrative: National Highway Network Development in Balochistan Project

description.narrative: The project will rehabilitate 79 km of the existing two-lane road of Zhob-Mughal Kot (N50) and 128 km of the existing two-lane road of Qila Saifullah-Waghum Rud (N70) in Balochistan of Pakistan

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Reduced transport cost from Balochistan to the political and industrial centers of the country

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
By 2018, the travel time reduced to 22 hours from Quetta to Multan (from 28 hours in 2013)

description.narrative: Reduced transport cost from Balochistan to the political and industrial centers of the country

title.narrative: By 2018, the travel time reduced to 25 hours from Quetta to Peshawar (from 30 hours in 2013)

description.narrative: Reduced transport cost from Balochistan to the political and industrial centers of the country

title.narrative: By 2018, the travel time reduced to 28 hours from Quetta to Islamabad (from 33 hours in 2013)
